idea:
CupAdd is India’s Only Cups Advertising Company that specializes in handheld branding of your product and services in the several work spaces, bringing clients closer to their target customers. Through displaying a logo, marketing message, or special promotion on our eco-friendly paper cups, our clients can place their advertisement directly to their target customer place of work– it’s like putting your Ads in your customers’ hands!
Furthermore, although we have our head office being situated in Mumbai but we have our network widespread across other metropolitan cites of the nation, like Delhi-NCR, Lucknow, etc.CupAdd
name: OLGA CONSULTING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
At CloudNxt we are Obsessed with our love for technology and the infinite possibilities it can create for making this world a better place. Our clients find us at our best when we are challenged with their toughest of the problems and we love chasing the problems.  
Our global delivery model has earned the trust and reputation of being a partner of choice. We have a strong heritage built on great people who put customers first and deliver exceptional results with no surprises - every time. We partner with you to understand the interconnection of user experience, business goals, and information technology.
name: CloudNxt

idea:
In line with the vision of Digital India, Walletz International plans to enable small businesses, retailers and customers by providing a unique digital platform that would help generate the following:-
a) New business growth and incremental customer demand to simplified processes and     shopping experience for customers.
b) Open Platform to empower small, medium enterprises(SME) and retailers to directly manage     their own customers and offer deals and discounts to attract more business.
c) Provide digital marketing, social media marketing capabilities to transform traditional     business management methods. To empower businesses, to proactively target customers     using real time analytics, customer service platform and chat capability to retain existing     customers and avoid decreasing business trend.
d) To provide end to end e-commerce services across all businesses of online shopping,     internet advertising, creating virtual malls, stores, shops, creating shopping catalogues, net     commerce solutions for business to business and business to consumers and to provide a     platform to retailers and deal partners to offer their deals on an application so that     customers can shop with discounts and deals at their outlets and to provide digital services.
name: Walletz International Private Limited
